Title: Bob le Flambeur
Writer: Jean-Pierre Melville (original story), Jean-Pierre Melville (adaptation), Auguste Le Breton (adaptation), Auguste Le Breton (dialogue)
Actors: Isabelle Corey, Daniel Cauchy, Roger Duchesne, Guy Decomble
Plot: Bob, an old gangster and gambler is almost broke, so he decides in spite of the warnings of a friend, a high official from the police, to rob a gambling casino in Dauville. Everything is planned exactly, but the police is informed about the planned coup. Meanwhile in the Casino Bob starts to gamble.
